dict.string: The two families bore an inveterate hatred for each other and the bitterness went back several generations.
That which cannot be changed, Unchangeable
There are certain things that can be changed according to the situations and needs, but some of the things are so immutable that they have to be accepted as they are
Very difficult to control, manage, or solve, Extremely stubborn
The problem appeared intractable to both Eric and I, but Dave managed to solve it within five minutes
Dull and expressionless. Also, without feeling
While all the others were celebrating their victory over their rivals, Don alone stood impassive, showing no expressions
A person who does not respect conventional ideas, who attacks established beliefs or customs
Though he is modern, we cannot call him an iconoclast because he still respects his culture and traditions, and his father's conventional ideas
